revised_title: Mathematical Contributions to the Theory of Evolution: On the Application of Certain Formulas in the Theory of Correlation to Inheritance of Characters Not Capable of Quantitative Measurement
tldr: The author investigates the relationship between eye color and fertility, as well as the inheritance of characters not capable of quantitative measurement, using mathematical formulas and statistical analysis. The study finds that while there may be some correlation between eye color and fertility, homogamous unions do not appear to be more fertile.
